segments.text: Where are you going for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea . I have no appetite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know of a restaurant . I'm sure you'll like it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go there then . Is it a Chinese restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes.it serves excellent Sichuan food . Spicy food may improve your appetite .
segments.speaker: S1
